name: Griffin
text: Well look at that, they sent another Hunter

name: Griffin
text: So your here to kill our King right?

name: Griffin
text: Because I kind of want him dead to

name: Griffin
text: So I'm just gonna tell you where he is so you don't get lost like the other's

name: Griffin
text: So all you have to do is..

name: Griffin
text: Go up the stair's right beside me then head right until you get there

name: Griffin
text: And here's some advice, fallow the brick road and watch out for the king's acid

name: Griffin
text: Of course, there will be monsters out there when you arrive

name: Griffin
text: And you will meet my brother's along the way
